overview: Sometimes you just have to take the good news with the bad. On one hand, your beautiful wife has whispered in your ear that she's ready and willing to become a mother and that she's sure you'll make a wonderful father. On the other hand, you're not going to be the one to blast that baby up into her belly. No, your wife is going to have someone a whole lot bigger and blacker hose down her ovaries. Your only job is to help siphon that spunk out of her new lover's dick and to do so with a smile on your face! Lucky you!
title: Black Bi Cuckolding 9
